name: The Ball Reach
description:
"The Ball Reach"
It's a Balance Ball Game.
Control the ball by arrow controls Or A,S,D,W buttons..
Control the camera by M & N buttons..
you are able to move the camera in 4 direction in "horizontal"...
The aim of the game is to balance the ball & avoid the ball from falling down..
You will see some traps on your way...
The game has 9 levels to play..
Notices:
This Game doesn't support music...
The price of the game is different form country to country..
There could be a difference of 1 to 3 extra $ cents compared to the price you see on steam..
Note: The game price is cheaper on Android platform..
